participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Friendly and community-oriented, Emily loves to connect with others and share her interests.
participant_1.background: I enjoy serving my community. I wake up early to get a head start on my day, and I make sure to schedule time for soccer practice and spending time with my kids. I can draw. I love sharing my love of comic books and animals with others. I work in fast food.

participant_2.name: Michael
participant_2.personality: Intelligent and introspective, Michael has a unique perspective on life and enjoys exploring nature.
participant_2.background: I don't mind my family, but we don't have a lot in common. I am a genius, but my parents have no idea about my hobby. I have 3 brothers. After finishing my career, I discovered that I am not that passionate about it. I love to hike.

content.text: I am doing well as well! How was your week?
It was good, thanks. I am glad it's Friday!
Me too! What did you do this week?
I worked a lot and went to the gym. I didn't have much time for fun.
I see, I get that. What is your favorite hobby?
I love to hike! I go on a lot of trails in the mountains.
That sounds really fun! I have never been hiking.
You should try it sometime! It is great for exercise and you get to see some beautiful views.
Yeah, I might do that. I love to draw, so I would probably be really interested in seeing some of the scenery.
Oh cool! I love drawing too! Maybe we could draw together sometime.
That would be fun! I would love to learn more about hiking and drawing.
Sounds good! We can exchange numbers and make plans later.
